programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Valentina's Greek Vegetarian Moussaka - Valentina shows us how to make a very tasty Greek meal. Her delicious moussaka recipe is loaded with fresh vegetables and topped with green lentils that are packed with goodness.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Wood Ducks - Andy head's to the flooded forests of North America to find some wood duck chicks.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Pirate Yearbook - Captain Captain is busy looking at last year's Pirate Yearbook, but something is wrong with her picture! So Captain Captain tells the pirates to come up with a better photo for this year's edition!

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Football Fever - Krash finds a football somewhere and then he plays with it with He-He and Raccoon.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Treasure In The Plant Aisle - In the perilous plant aisle Supertato and Evil Pea team up to find treasure as they have half a map each, but she tricks him and steals the map to find the treasure for herself.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Biogas Power - Greener fuel spells trouble for Glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.
